# Crystal Release: Shuriken Wild Dance

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Crystal Release
- Classification: Kekkei Genkai~Crystal Release, Ninjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Guren
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
Guren surrounds herself in pink crystal particles, condensing them into numerous shuriken that continuously revolve around her as she launches them at high speeds.
